Channel.Description: Serial number
Module ID
Hardware variant
Firmware version
Mode switch
Battery status CPU (0 = battery low or missing, 1 = battery ok,)
Temperature CPU [1/10C]
Temperature cooling plate [1/10C]
System time at the start of the current task cycle [µs]
I/O power supply warning (0 = DC OK)
Bus current 0.1 A X2X Link IF6
Bus voltage 0.1 V X2X Link IF6
Node switch
Activate general master diagnostics.
Current internal error of master and/or slaves.
Channel.Description-de: Aktueller interner Fehler Master und/oder Slaves.

Channel.Description: Current configuration error of master and/or slaves.
Current connection error of master and/or slaves.
Current refresh error of slave(s).
Current slave error.
Error history of internal errors since last reset.
Channel.Description-de: Interne Fehler seit dem letzten Reset.

Channel.Description: Error history of configuration errors since last reset.
Error history of connection errors since last reset.
Error history of slave refresh errors since last reset.
Error history of slave errors since last reset.
Modbus master driver state.
Station number of slave with last error.
Channel.Description-de: Stationsnummer des Slaves, der zuletzt einen Fehler gemeldet hat.

Channel.Description: Last error of slave was an internal error.
Channel.Description-de: Der letzte gemeldete Fehler eines Slaves war ein interner Fehler.

Channel.Description: Last error of slave was a configuration error.
Channel.Description-de: Der letzte gemeldete Fehler eines Slaves war ein Konfigurationsfehler.

Channel.Description: Last error of slave was an overlaod error.
Channel.Description-de: Der letzte gemeldete Fehler eines Slaves war ein Überladungssfehler.

Channel.Description: Last error of slave was a MODBUS error.
Channel.Description-de: Der letzte gemeldete Fehler eines Slaves war ein MODBUS Fehler.

Channel.Description: Last error of slave was a connection error.
Channel.Description-de: Der letzte gemeldete Fehler eines Slaves war ein Verbindungsfehler.

Channel.Description: Last error of slave was a refresh error.
Channel.Description-de: Der letzte gemeldete Fehler eines Slaves war ein Aktualisierungsfehler.

Channel.Description: Time between two diagnostic log entries [ms].
Channel.Description-de: Zeit zwischen zwei Diagnosemeldungen im Logbuch [ms].

Channel.Description: Link state
Margin to output cycle deadline in microseconds
Node number currently in use
Indication for proper cyclic operation (1 = operational)
Indication for a synchronized POWERLINK-system (1 = synchronized)
Absolute time extracted from current SoC-Frame (NetTime in POWERLINK V2) - Seconds
Absolute time extracted from current SoC-Frame (NetTime in POWERLINK V2) - Nanoseconds
Network time extracted from current SoC-Frame [µs] (RelativeTime in POWERLINK V2)
Network time offset to local system time [µs]
Overall number of bus cycles
Number of failed bus cycles
Number of cycle time violations
Unoccupied time during one POWERLINK cycle [µs]
allways 0, available for legacy projects
Number of bus cycles
Number of bus cycles with set break signal
Timestamp when the current input frame was started [µs]
Number of failed synchronous frames
Number of memory access errors within synchronous frame (overflow/underrun)
Number of not sent synchronous frames (sender not ready)
Number of not received synchronous frames (timeout)
Number of faulty synchronous frames
Number of synchronous frames which could not be sent because of receiving a frame
Number of failed asynchronous frames
Number of memory access errors within asynchronous frame (overflow/underrun)
Number of not sent asynchronous frames (sender not ready)
Number of not received asynchronous frames (timeout)
Number of faulty asynchronous frames
Number of asynchronous frames which could not be sent because of receiving a frame
Number of cycles when DMA for cyclic outputs was too late
Number of max. stations
Number of configured stations
Station at end of bus
Time of last change at station on end of bus
First station which recognizes output frame error
Time of last change of channel StationPastOutFrameError
First station which recognizes input frame error
Time of last change of channel StationPastInFrameError
Size of synchronous input frame [Bytes]
Size of synchronous output frame [Bytes]
Size of asynchronous frame [Bytes]
Size reserve within asynchronous frame [Bytes]
Configured bus length [m]
Module state (1 = module operational)
Current slave error is an internal error.
Channel.Description-de: Aktueller Fehler ist ein interner Fehler.

Channel.Description-de: Zähler, wie oft ein erfolgloser Verbindungsaufbauversuch zu diesem Slave auftrat.

Channel.Description: Counter of refresh time out.
Channel.Description-de: Zähler, wie oft der Refresh Timer überschritten wurde.
